attributes.action: Scrap the television licence. Let the BBC fund themselves.
attributes.additional_details: The television licence is an unfair tax on the public. There are now hundreds of TV channels none of which require a TV licence. The BBC should have to stand on its own two feet. Many of the programs that are on the BBC are repeated. If the BBC struggle financially thy should take a luck at the salaries they pay to their staff.
attributes.background: I want the government to make the BBC self funding, and abolish the television licence.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Scrap the BBC TV Licence & replace funding with adverts or paywall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727365
